juzs.text: Blessed is the One that the kingdom is in His hands, and He is capable of everything
The One who created the death and the life to test which one of you does better work. And He is the powerful, the forgiving
The One who created seven skies one above the other. You do not see any inconsistency in the creations of the beneficent. So return the eye (and look again), do you see any cracks
Then return the eye (and look again and) again, the eye returns to you ashamed and tired
And We have certainly beautified the world's sky with lamps (stars), and We made them meteorites for (throwing at) the devils, and We prepared the punishment of burning fire for them
And for those who disbelieved in their Master is punishment of hell, and it is a bad destination
When they are thrown in it, they hear an awful roar from it while it boils
It nearly blows up from the rage. Every time a bunch (of disbelievers) is thrown in it, its keepers ask them: did not a warner come to you
They say: yes, a warner has come to us, but we denied and we said: God did not send down anything, you are only in a great error
And they (also) say: if we had listened or had understood, we would not be among inhabitants of the burning fire
So they confess to their sin, and down with the inhabitants of the burning fire
Those who are afraid of their Master in secret, there is forgiveness and a great reward for them
Whether you hide your word or you disclose it, He knows what is inside the chests
Does He not know what He created? He is the nice, the well informed
He is the One who made the earth tame for you, so walk in its tracts and eat of His provision. The resurrection is to Him
Are you safe from the One in the sky that He does not make you sink in the earth when it suddenly shakes
Or are you safe from the One in the sky that He does not send a sandstorm upon you? Then you are going to know how My warning is
And those before them have certainly denied, so how was My rejection (and punishment)
Or did they not look at the birds above them spreading (their) wings and folding them? What holds them except the beneficent? He sees everything
Or who is this, the one who is an army for you helping you, other than the beneficent? The disbelievers are only in deception
Or who is this, the one who provides for you if He withholds His provision? No, but they insist on rebellion and hatred
Is someone who walks with his face downward better guided or someone who walks properly on a straight path
Say: He is the One who created you and made the hearing and the sight and the heart for you, but you thank a little
say: He is the One who scattered you on the earth, and you will be gathered to Him
And they say: when is this promise, if you are truthful
Say: the knowledge of it is only with God, and I am only to warn clearly
Then when they see it near, faces of those who disbelieved turns gloomy, and it is said: this is that which you used to called for
Say: what do you think if God destroys me and those with me or He has mercy on us, then who protects the disbelievers from a painful punishment
Say: He is the beneficent, we believed in Him and we trust in Him, and you are going to know who is in an obvious error
Say: what do you think if your water (sinks deep and) becomes dried up, then who brings you (fresh) running water
Nun (the letter N), by the pen and what they write
you are not a madman by your Master's grace
And indeed an unending reward is for you
And you are indeed of a great character (and morality)
So you are going to see and they will see
which of you is the crazy one
Indeed your Master knows best who is lost from His way, and He knows best who the guided ones are
So do not obey the deniers
They wish that you be flexible, then they would be flexible
So do not obey any insignificant oath taker
slandering, going around (spreading) malicious lies
preventing the good, exceeding the limits, sinful
ill-mannered (and despicable), and after all this mean (and notorious)
even if he is wealthy and has many children
When Our verses are read to him, he says: stories of the earlier ones
We are going to brand him on the nose
Indeed We test them as We tested the owners of the garden when they swore that they shall pick it in the morning
with no exceptions
Then a disaster, from your Master, came to it while they were sleep
so it became as like a totally picked field
Then they called one another in the morning
(saying): go to your crop early if you are pickers
so they went on, and they were talking softly (saying)
no poor shall enter it over you today
And they went out early determined and capable
Then when they saw it they said: we are lost
no, but we are deprived
The fairest of them said: did I not tell you, why do you not glorify (God)
They said: our Master is flawless, indeed we were wrongdoers
So they turned on each other blaming one another
They said: woe to us, indeed we were rebellious
Perhaps our Master gives us better than that in exchange, indeed we are fond of our Master
That is how the punishment is, and the punishment of the hereafter is certainly greater, if they knew
Indeed there are gardens of delight for those who control themselves with their Master
Should We place the submitted ones the same as the guilty ones
What is with you, how do you judge (like this)
Do you have a book that you study from it
and indeed whatever you choose is in it for you
Or do you have any vows (binding) on Us, reaching to the resurrection day, that whatever you judge is yours
Ask them which one of them guarantees this
Or do they have associates? Then let them bring their associates if they are truthful
On a day when leg is bared (and the deeds are exposed) and they are called to the prostration, but they cannot
Lowering their eyes, humiliation overcomes them, and they had been called to show humbleness while they were sound and healthy
So leave Me (alone) with anyone who denies this saying, We are going to gradually lure them to destruction from where they do not know
And I give them time, as My plan is solid
Or do you ask them for a wage, and they are weighed down by the debt
Or is the unseen with them, so they write it
So be patient for judgment of your Master and do not be like companion of the fish (Jonah) when he called out while he was irritated
If it was not for a favor from his Master that had reached him, he would have been thrown to the desert shore while he was condemned
But his Master chose him and made him of the righteous
And those who disbelieved almost make you slip with their eyes when they hear the reminder, and they say: he is certainly mad
And it is only a reminder for humankind
The inevitable disaster
What is the inevitable disaster
And do you know what the inevitable disaster is
Thamud and Aad denied the pounding catastrophe
So as for Thamud, they were destroyed by the rebellion (or the thunderbolt)
And as for Aad, they were destroyed by a violent ice cold wind
which He subjected them to seven night and eight days of it consecutively, then you see the people fallen down in it as if they were trunks of hollow (and dried up) palm tree
So do you see any of them left
And Pharaoh and those before him and the turned over cities (Sodom and Gomorrah) came with sinning
Then they disobeyed their Master's messenger, so He took them (into punishment), an increasing punishment
Indeed when the water rose up, We carried you on the sailing ship (the Ark)
So that We make it a reminder for you, and attentive ear to remember it
So when the trumpet is blown, a single blow
and the earth and the mountains are lifted and crushed in a single blow
Then on that day the event happens
and the sky splits, then on that day it (the sky) is weak
and the angels are at its sides, and eight (angels) carry your Master’s throne above them
On that day you are presented (before God) and none of your secrets remains hidden
So, as for anyone who is given his book (of records) to his right hand, he says: here, read my book
indeed I thought that I come across my account
Then he will be in a pleasant life
in an excellent garden
its bunches of fruits are nearby (within easy reach)
(They are told): eat and drink joyfully for what you sent in advance in the days gone by
But anyone who is given his book to his left hand, he says: I wish I was not given my book
and I did not know what is my account
I wish it was the end
my wealth was of no use to me
my power departed from me
(It will be said): take him and shackle him
then make him enter (and burn in) the hellfire
then put him in a chain that its length is seventy cubits
for indeed he would not believe in the great God
and he would not encourage feeding the poor
So there is no close friend for him here today
and no food except pus
that no one eats it except the sinners
So I swear by what you see
and what you do not see
that it (Quran) is certainly a noble messenger’s word
and it is not word of a poet. A few of you believe (or you believe a little)
And it is not word of a fortune-teller (or a priest). You take a little notice
A sending down from the Master of Human kind
And if he had made up some saying (and attributed them) to Us
We would have certainly taken him by the right hand
then We would have cut off his main artery
and none of you could have kept it away from him
And certainly it (Quran) is certainly a reminder for those who control themselves
And We certainly know that some of you are deniers
And it is certainly (cause of) a regret for the disbelievers
And it is certainly the sure truth
So glorify the name of your great Master
A questioner asked about a punishment bound to happen
None can prevent it for the disbelievers
(It is) from God, the owner of the places of ascent
The angels and the spirit ascend to Him in a day that its measure is fifty thousand years
So be patient, a nice patience
Indeed they see it far
while We see it near
A day that the sky is like the melted copper
and the mountains are like the colored wool
and a friend does not ask about a friend
(although) they are made to see them. The guilty wish to redeems himself from punishment of that day by (offering) his children
and his spouse and his brother
and his family who sheltered him
and everyone on the earth, so that it saves him
No way. Indeed it is flame (of hell)
stripping off the scalp (by burning it)
calling anyone who turned his back and turned away
and collected and withheld (his wealth)
Indeed the human being is created greedy (and anxious)
Impatient (and anxious) when the badness touches him
and miserly (and stingy) when the goodness touches him
except the performers of mandatory prayers
those who perform their mandatory prayer all the time
and those who have a known entitlement in their wealth
for the beggar and the disadvantaged
and those who acknowledge the judgment day
and those who are afraid of their Master's punishment
as indeed no one is safe from their Master's punishment
and those who guard their private parts
except from their spouses or what their right hands own as indeed they are blameless
and anyone who looks for (anything) beyond this then they are of those exceeding the limits
and those who observe their trusts and their promise
and those who are upstanding in their testimony
and those who guard their mandatory prayer
They are the honored ones in gardens
So what is with those who disbelieved, rushing (and staring) toward you
from the right and from the left in groups
Does every one of them expect to enter garden of delight
No way. Indeed We created them from what they know
So I swear by the Master of the easts and the wests that We are certainly able
to substitute better than them, and We are not surpassed
So leave them talk uselessly and play until they meet their day which they are promised
A day that they come out of the graves in a hurry as if they are rushing to an idol (or to a goal)
Lowering their eyes, humiliation overcomes them, that is the day that they were being promised
Indeed We sent Noah to his people (telling him): warn your people before a painful punishment comes to them
He said: my people, I am a clear warner for you
(warning you) that you should serve God and be cautious of Him and obey me
He forgives you of your sins and He postpones you for a limited period. Indeed when God's appointed time comes, it is not postponed if you knew
He said: my Master, indeed I invited my people night and day
but my invitation only increased (their) running away
and indeed every time I invited them so that You forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears and covered themselves with their clothes and insisted and were extremely arrogant
So I invited them openly
then indeed I made it public for them, and confided in them secretly
then I said: ask forgiveness from your Master, indeed He is very forgiving
He sends plenty of rain on you from the sky
and He helps you with wealth and children, and He makes gardens for you and He makes rivers for you
What is with you that you do not expect any magnificence for God
While He has created you in phases
Did you not see how God created seven skies one above the other
And He made the moon in them as a light, and made the sun as a lamp
And He made you grow from the earth (like) a plant
then He returns you into it and brings you out (in another) bringing out
And God made the earth a widespread mat for you
so that you move around in it on wide roadways
Noah said: my Master, indeed they disobeyed me and followed someone whose wealth and children did not add anything to him except loss
And they plotted a great plot
And they said: do not leave your gods, and do not leave Wadd or Suwa or Yaghus and Ya'uq and Nasr
And (Noah said): they have misguided many (people), so do not increase the wrongdoers except in error
They were drowned because of their sins, then they were made to enter a fire, and they did not find any helpers for themselves other than God
And Noah said: my Master, do not leave any of the disbelievers living on the land
indeed if You leave them, they misguide Your servants, and they would only give birth to disbelieving immoral
My Master, forgive me and my parents, and anyone who enters my house (being a) believer, and the believing men and the believing women, and do not increase the wrongdoer except in destruction
Say: it was revealed to me that a group of the Jinn listened, then they said: indeed we heard an amazing Quran
it guides to the right way, so we believed in it, and we will never associate anyone with our Master
and that our Master’s majesty is great, and He did not take a spouse or a child
and that the fools among us used to say outrageous (lies) about God
and that we assumed that humans and Jinn never lie about God
And there were men among humans who were looking for protection of the Jinn's men, so they increased them in foolishness (and injustice)
And that they assumed as you assumed, that God never raises anyone
And that we touched the sky, then we found it filled with tough guards and shooting flames
And that we used to sit in its seats for listening, but anyone who listens now finds a shooting flame waiting for him
And we do not know if badness is wanted for anyone on the earth or their Master wants a right way for them
And that some of us are the righteous and some of us are otherwise, we are (following) different ways
And that we know that we will never incapacitate God on the earth, and we will never incapacitate Him by running away
And that when we heard the guidance, we believed in it. Anyone who believes in his Master, then he should not be afraid of a reduced reward or any injustice
And that some of us are the submitted ones, and some of us are the unjust, so whoever submits (to God) then they pursue a right way
And as for the unjust, they are fuel for hell
And if they keep on the (right) way, then We give them plenty of water to drink (and plenty of wealth and provision)
so that We test them in it. And anyone who stays away from his Master's remembrance, He puts him in a terrible punishment
And that the places of worship belongs to God, so do not call on anyone with God
And that when God's servant stood up calling on Him, they almost mobbed him
Say: I only call on my Master and I do not associate anyone with Him
Say: I do not have power of any harm or any benefit for you
Say: Indeed no one will ever protect me from God, and I will never find any shelter other than Him
(I have not responsibility) except preaching from God and His message. And anyone who disobeys God and His messenger, then indeed fire of hell is for him, remaining in there forever
Until when they see what they are promised, then they are going to know who is weaker in helper and fewer in number
Say: I do not know whether what you are promised is near or if my Master has set a far out time for it
Knower of the unseen, and He does not inform anyone of His unseen
except any messenger whom He approves, then He sends observers in front of him and behind him
so that He knows that they have preached their Master’s message, and He surrounds (and has full knowledge of) whatever is with them and He keeps count of everything
You who wrap yourself
get up at night, except a little
half of it or a little less of it
or add (a little) to it, and recite the Quran distinctly (and thoughtfully)
Indeed We are going to throw a heavy word on you
Indeed rising up at night is more effective and more appropriate for word (of prayer)
Indeed you have lengthy occupations during the day
And remember the name of you Master, and devote your life to Him devotedly
Master of the east and the west, there is no god except Him, so take Him as an advocate
And be patient about what they say and break up with them, a nice separation
And leave Me and the deniers who have the good life, and give them a little time
Indeed there is shackles and hellfire with Us
and food that chokes and a painful punishment (for them)
on a day that the earth and the mountains shake and the mountains become a pile of flowing sands
Indeed We sent a messenger to you as a witness over you as We sent a messenger to Pharaoh
Then Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We took him, a disastrous taking
So if you disbelieve then how do you protect (yourselves) on a day that makes the children white haired (and grow old), if you disbelieved
(A day that) the sky is torn apart in it. God's promise shall be done
Indeed this (Quran) is a reminder, so anyone who wants, takes a way to his Master (with it)

Indeed your Master knows that you and a group of those with you get up nearly two third of the night or half of it or one third of it. God determines (length of) the night and the day, and He knows that you never calculate it, so He turned to you (in mercy), therefore read as much as you can from Quran. He knows that some of you are going to get sick and others move around on the earth looking for His bounty and others fight in God's way, so read as much as you can from it, and perform the mandatory prayer and give to mandatory charity and lend God a good loan (or offer God a good deed). And whatever good you send ahead for yourselves, you find it as a better and greater reward with God. And ask forgiveness of God, as God is indeed forgiving and merciful
You who cover yourself
get up and warn
and magnify your Master
and cleanse your clothes
and keep away from the filth
and do not do favor to ask for more
and be patient for (the sake of) your Master
So when the trumpet is blown
then that day is a difficult day
not easy upon the disbelievers
Leave Me alone with whom I created
and I gave him plenty of wealth
and sons (who are) present
and made (everything) easy for him, so easy
yet he desires that I increase (it for him)
No way. He is indeed stubborn against Our signs
I am going to make him suffer a terrible punishment
Indeed he thought and calculated
So death to him, how did he calculate
Then (again), death to him, how did he calculate
Then he looked
then he frowned and looked angry
then he turned back and showed arrogance
Then he said: this is only a passed along magic
this is nothing but word of a human being
I am going to enter (and burn) him in hell
And do you know what hell is
It does not spare and it does not leave
burning the human being (skin and flesh)
(Guarding) over it are nineteen (angels)

and We only made the angels as guardians of the fire and We made their numbers (nineteen) only as a test for those who disbelieved, so that those who were given the book would be certain and to increase the belief of those who believed, and those who were given the book and the believers would not doubt, and so that those who have a disease in their hearts and the disbelievers say: what did God intend with this example. That is how God misguides anyone He wants and guides anyone He wants. And none knows God's soldiers except Him. And this is only a reminder for the human being
No way, by the moon
and the night when it retreats
and the morning when it lightens
indeed it (hell) is one of the greatest (signs)
a warning for the human being
for anyone of you who wants to be ahead or to be behind
Every person is bonded by what he did
except associates of the right (the fortunate)
in gardens, asking
from the guilty ones
what did enter you in hell
They say: we were not the performers of mandatory prayers
and we were not feeding the poor
and we used to enter into useless conversation with those conversing uselessly
and we used to deny the judgment day
until the certainty (of death) came to us
So mediation of the mediators does not benefit them
So what is with them that they turn away from the reminder (Quran)
as if they are scared donkeys
running away from a lion
No, but every one of them wants to be given open papers (from God)
Not at all, but they are not afraid of the hereafter
Not at all, indeed it is a reminder
so anyone who wants takes notice of it
And they do not take notice unless God wants, as He is entitled to be cautioned of, and is entitled to forgive
I swear by the resurrection day
and I swear by the blaming soul
does the human being think that We will never put his bones together
Yes, We are able to restore his fingertips (finger prints)
But the human being wants to live sinfully in his time to come
He asks: when is the resurrection day
When the eye is baffled
and the moon is darkened
and the sun and the moon are joined together
On that day the human being says: where is the escape
No way, there is no shelter
On that day the place of settlement is to your Master
On that day the human being is informed of what he sent ahead and he put off
But the human being has understanding about himself
even if he presents his excuses
Do not move your tongue with it to be in a hurry for it (to remember it)
Indeed its collection and its reading is Our responsibility
So when We read it, then you follow its reading
Then indeed its explanation is Our responsibility
No way, but you like the transient (this world’s life)
and you leave the hereafter
On that day some faces glow (from happiness)
looking at their Master
And on that day some faces are gloomy (from sadness)
thinking that a back breaking punishment will be done to them
No way, when it (life) reaches to the collarbones (and the throat)
and it is said: who is a healer
And he thinks that it is the (time of) separation
and the leg is twisted around the leg
on that day the course is to you Master
He did not accept the truth and he did not pray
but he denied and he turned away
then he went to his family walking proudly
Woe to you and woe
Then woe to you and woe
Does the human being think that he is left aimlessly
Was he not a fertilized egg from ejaculated semen
then it became a (dangling, clinging, and leach like) blood clot, then He created and shaped (it)
then He made two kinds of it, the male and the female
Is not such (a creator) able to give life to the dead
Did not a period of time come upon the human being that he was nothing to be mentioned
Indeed We created the human being from a mixture of fertilized egg (Zygote) to test him, and We made hearing and sight for him
Indeed We guided him to the way, whether he is grateful or whether he is ungrateful
We prepared chains and shackles and burning fire for the disbelievers
Indeed the good ones drink from a cup that its mixture is camphor
A spring that God's servants drink from it, they make it flow out, flowing out (as they please)
They fulfill the pledge and they are afraid of a day that its badness is wide spread
and they feed the food to poor and orphans and captives for His love
(saying:) we feed you only for God's sake, we don't want any reward or thanks from you
we are afraid of our Master in a harsh and distressful day
So God protected them from badness of that day and gave them vitality and happiness
And their reward for what they endured is garden and silk
Leaning on sofas in it, they do not see (burning) sun and bitter (freezing) cold in it
And its shades are close over them and its fruits are lowered, hanging low
And silver bowls and drinking glasses made of crystals are circulated among them
crystals like silver, they determine their measure (and size)
And in there, they are given drink from a cup that its mixture is ginger
from a spring in there called Salsabil
And immortal youth circulate among them, that when you see them you think they are scattered pearls
And when you see it, then you see delight and a great kingdom
There are clothes of fine green silk and brocade on them, and they are decorated with silver bracelets, and their Master gives them a pure drink to drink
Indeed this is a reward for you, and your effort is appreciated
Indeed We sent this Quran down to you gradually
So persevere (and be patient) for your Master's command, and do not obey any sinful or ungrateful (disbeliever) among them
And remember your Master’s name morning and afternoon
And during part of the night show your humbleness for Him, and glorify Him long during a night
Indeed these love the transient (this world’s life), and they leave a cumbersome day behind
We created them and We strengthened their form, and when We want We replace them with like them as a substitute
Indeed this (Quran) is a reminder, so anyone who wants takes a way to his Master (with it)
And you do not want except if God wants. Indeed God is knowledgeable and wise
He admits anyone He wants to His mercy, and He prepared a painful punishment for the wrongdoers
By those sent in succession
then by the hurricane, gusting
and by the spreaders, spreading
then by the separators, separating
then by those communicating a reminder
as an excuse or as a warning
that indeed what you are promised shall occur
So when the stars are wiped out
and when the sky is split open
and when the mountains are powdered
and when the messengers' time is set
For what day is the appointment set
For the day of separation/decision
And do you know what the day of separation/decision is
Woe to the deniers on that day
Did We not destroy the earlier ones
Then We make the later ones follow them (in destruction)
That is how We deal with the guilty ones
Woe to the deniers on that day
Did We not create you from despicable water
Then We placed it in a safe quarter (the womb)
for a known period
So We are able, and We are very capable
Woe to the deniers on that day
Did We not make the earth a holder
(for) living and dead
And We placed towering mountains in it, and We gave you sweet fresh water to drink
Woe to the deniers on that day
(They will be told): proceed to what you were denying it
proceed to a three pronged shadow (of smoke)
that is not a shade and is of no use against the flame
which indeed it shoots up sparks like towers
as if they were yellow camels
Woe to the deniers on that day
This is a day that they do not speak
and it is not permitted for them to apologize
Woe to the deniers on that day
This is the day of separation/decision, We assemble you and the earlier ones
So if you have a plot (trick), then plot it
Woe to the deniers on that day
Indeed those who control themselves are in shades and springs
and fruits of whatever they desire
Eat and drink joyfully for what you used to do
Indeed that is how We reward the good doers
Woe to the deniers on that day
Eat and enjoy a little, you are indeed the guilty ones
Woe to the deniers on that day
And when they are told to bow down, they do not bow down
Woe to the deniers on that day
So in what saying do they believe after it (Quran)
